name: it's ur first game day today. did you do good? or you didn't perform but you tried ur best? regardless i'm still really proud of you
greetingText: in case if you didn't it's still fine baby. every athletes have their days of not performing well. it doesn't necessary mean that you're a bad player
wishText: from NJFC to Bangkok is never easy. i know you can do well this time one baby
text1: don't stress out urself throughout this trip b. it's just ur first year and you'll have many years more to go. next year i'll be by ur side okay?
textInChatBox: i really miss you alot baby :(
text2: i know i've been saying that alot for the past few days but i realllllyyyyy do miss you alot
text3: and GOODJOB BABYYY!! you done ur first day of game. you'll be back real soon. my fav floorball player frr. i'm really a proud girlfriend as you can see
text4: i decided to do this cuz i wanna make you feel better when i'm not there with you and cuz
outroText: now come back and tell me if you like it
replayText: or click if you want to watch it again
